record.title: UNANIMOUS CONSENT AGREEMENT--RESOLUTIONS EN BLOC
record.narrative:
UNANIMOUS CONSENT AGREEMENT--RESOLUTIONS EN BLOC -- (Senate - December 18, 2007)

[Page: S15936]

speaking.paragraph: I ask unanimous consent that the Senate now proceed to the en bloc consideration of the following Senate resolutions which were submitted earlier today: S. Res. 410, 411, 412, 413, 414, 415, and 416.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.

speaking.paragraph: I ask unanimous consent that the resolutions be agreed to, the preambles be agreed to, and the motions to reconsider be laid upon the table en bloc.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
